message: Welcome Anon! Le Galerie de JS is absolutely open to the public; we're so glad you joined us today!
action1: Thank you! Glad to be here!

message: We'd offer you a glass of wine, but we can't really be sure if you are of age. The insurance on this place is insane, so we can't risk it, sorry.
Glad you understand! Now then, are we ready for an exquisite tour of the gallery?
